Analysis: Based on your measurements and goals, it is recommended to follow a balanced vegan diet with a calorie deficit to achieve weight loss.
Recommendations: Aim for a daily calorie intake of around 1500-1800 calories, spread across 3 main meals and 2-3 snacks. Include a variety of plant-based protein sources, whole grains, fruits, vegetables, and healthy fats.

Monday: Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk, chia seeds, and mixed berries
Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and chickpeas
Dinner: Lentil curry with brown rice
Snacks: Hummus with carrot sticks, mixed nuts
Tuesday: Breakfast: Vegan protein smoothie with spinach, banana, almond milk, and hemp seeds
Lunch: Mixed bean salad with avocado and quinoa
Dinner: Stir-fried tofu with vegetables and brown rice
Snacks: Apple slices with almond butter, roasted chickpeas
Wednesday: Breakfast: Whole grain toast with mashed avocado and tomato slices
Lunch: Vegan lentil soup with a side of whole grain bread
Dinner: Baked falafel with quinoa and roasted vegetables
Snacks: Vegan protein bar, cucumber slices with hummus
Thursday: Breakfast: Vegan protein pancakes with fresh berries
Lunch: Chickpea salad wrap with whole grain tortilla
Dinner: Vegan chili with kidney beans and quinoa
Snacks: Mixed fruit salad, rice cakes with almond butter
Friday: Breakfast: Tofu scramble with vegetables and whole grain toast
Lunch: Vegan sushi rolls with brown rice, avocado, and cucumber
Dinner: Spaghetti with marinara sauce and lentil meatballs
Snacks: Vegan yogurt with granola, roasted edamame
Saturday: Breakfast: Vegan protein smoothie bowl topped with granola and mixed fruits
Lunch: Quinoa and black bean stuffed bell peppers
Dinner: Vegan stir-fried noodles with tofu and vegetables
Snacks: Rice crackers with guacamole, mixed nuts
Sunday: Breakfast: Vegan breakfast burrito with tofu scramble, black beans, and salsa
Lunch: Vegan chickpea and vegetable curry with brown rice
Dinner: Vegan shepherd's pie with lentils and mashed sweet potatoes
Snacks: Vegan protein shake, carrot sticks with hummus
